title: Consolidate CSPM Solutions

title: Eliminate SIEM Redundancy

title: Optimize EDR Stack

title: Streamline Identity Management
description: Reduce Azure AD usage and consolidate identity management on Okta to eliminate duplicate IAM capabilities
business_impact: Save $85K annually while maintaining single sign-on capabilities

title: Consolidate SCA Solutions
description: Remove Veracode and standardize on Snyk for software composition analysis
business_impact: Eliminate $95K in annual SCA costs while maintaining vulnerability scanning
